quest.name: Tactical Planning
journal: Acting Guildmaster Thubyrgeim wishes to assess the improvement of your arcanima skills.
In order to once again gauge your growth as an arcanist, Thubyrgeim bids you travel to western La Noscea to engage in battle with more ferocious foes. Slay three roselings and three wild jackals.
You have slain the designated creatures. Return to the Arcanists' Guild and report to Thubyrgeim.

Satisfied with the results of your training, Thubyrgeim next orders you to accompany K'lyhia on an official inspection. Seek out the foreseer in the practice area and learn the details of your forthcoming duty.

The foreseer explains that a goblin family of peddlers known as the Boilstox is suspected of dealing in black market goods. Predicting a violent response to her inspection, K'lyhia bids you stand ready to execute a tactic she has dubbed “Stratagem Focus Fire.” Travel to middle La Noscea, and rendezvous with the assessor at the goblins' location.
You have successfully subdued the Boilstox. Speak with K'lyhia and follow her instructions.

K'lyhia educates you on the necessity of knowing your own strengths and weaknesses when formulating strategies. Return to Thubyrgeim at the Arcanists' Guild and inform her that the inspection is complete.

After returning to the guild and making your report, Thubyrgeim hints that your burgeoning abilities may soon qualify you for a more ambitious assignment. Continue to improve and experiment with your strategies in preparation for the next call to duty.

※The next arcanist quest will be available from Thubyrgeim upon reaching level 15.
objectives: Report to Thubyrgeim at the Arcanists' Guild.
Speak with K'lyhia in middle La Noscea.
Report to Thubyrgeim at the Arcanists' Guild.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Yes, Forename, the time for your next lesson is upon us. You are keeping well, I trust? Taking the occasional brisk walk? One cannot form sound thoughts if one fails to maintain a sound body.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Now, assuming you have been following K'lyhia's instructions, you should be ready to face the more dangerous threats found in western La Noscea.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: I speak of roselings and wild jackals. And yes, I would have you vanquish three of each. 'Tis the perfect sample size: the first acts as a preliminary test case, the second to test your hypotheses, the third to perfect the tactics you've devised.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, I trust your strategy will consist of more than simply flinging Ruin over and over again. You are not the novice you once were, and your skills in the field ought reflect that. If you find yourself wanting for other approaches, consider an assault with Ruin in tandem with attacks from your Carbuncle. When timed appropriately, you can deal a crippling blow to your opponent.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename. How did it feel to conquer such ferocious foes? Let us ride that wave of triumph onto an even more demanding─and dangerous─challenge.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Your next training exercise will have you accompanying Foreseer K'lyhia on one of her inspections.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: This experience will afford you the opportunity to witness firsthand the practical application of arcanima. Pray do not tarry, Forename─K'lyhia awaits you on the floor below with further details.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: A timely appearance, as I expected. Shall we proceed directly to the job at hand? I have been tasked with examining the wares of a goblin peddler caravan run by the Boilstox family.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Our agents suspect these beastman merchants of dealing in forbidden goods. As such, I have calculated that announcing an inspection has a 60% chance of inviting physical violence.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: I have prepared a strategy to respond to this possible shift into hostilities, but there is an important precondition you should be made aware of before we discuss the finer points of my plan.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Though I am considered gifted in the formation of tactics, I lack the reflexes and coordination necessary to employ many of those selfsame strategies on the field of battle. Pray keep this factor in mind, and adjust your perceptions accordingly.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Now, should the goblins offer battle, you are to execute Combat Pattern 1345, otherwise known as “Stratagem Focus Fire.”

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: You and your Carbuncle will concentrate your attacks on a single foe, and, one by one, the enemy will wither under the combined onslaught. Probability of victory: 95%.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Reports place the peddlers in the vicinity of the Cookpot, in middle La Noscea. I will depart immediately to assess the situation. Seek me out once you arrive.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: I am Foreseer K'lyhia of Mealvaan's Gate. You are to cease all transactions and surrender your goods for inspection.

dialogue.name: GOBURIN
dialogue.text: Nasty sneakypeekers! Gobbies spit uplander nosyeyes on stabbyiron!

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: A predictably aggressive response. Very well, Forename. Remember what we discussed!

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Nicely done. Adaptation, improvisation─I might have been observing our beloved guildmaster himself in action!

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: This was the perfect example of how the strategy for a given task should be tailored to the abilities of the assessor.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: In other words, before you begin formulating your tactics, it is necessary to fully understand your own strengths and weaknesses.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: On that note, there is another question I would ask you: when it comes to improving the probable success of a strategy, do you consider it more effective to concentrate on playing to your strengths, or shoring up your weaknesses?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Which do you concentrate on?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Enhancing my strengths.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Covering my weaknesses.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Oho, again you respond as the guildmaster once did. I must revise the probability for your potential to attain greatness to...97%. You are one to keep an eye on, that much is certain.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: But to return to the subject of battle plans, your calculations must include an accurate assessment of your available techniques and their relative effectiveness. This requires you to be critically aware of your own limits, the limits of your allies, and the characteristics of your enemies.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: I believe that covers everything for today. Please return to the guild and make your report to Mistress Thubyrgeim. Until next we meet.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: I shall abide here until the Yellowjackets arrive to take the peddlers into custody. My strategies will keep me company.

dialogue.name: KLYHIA
dialogue.text: Assuming Precondition C, the execution of Combat Maneuver B would impact Scenario A in a manner which would precipitate...

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Back from the field, Forename? K'lyhia contacted me with a summary of events.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: It seems you were treated to a lecture on “knowing thyself.” That particular lesson is ordinarily taught only to intermediate practitioners.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Without a sufficient store of combat experience from which to draw, it is difficult to fully appreciate the profundity of such a seemingly simple truth.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, I feel confident that you will soon be ready for a more ambitious assignment. Keep to your studies, and maintain the razor edge of your mind.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: One last thing, Forename. Considering the dedication you have shown towards our discipline, I have decided to permit you leave to explore the teachings offered by other guilds.

dialogue.name: THUBYRGEIM
dialogue.text: I would suggest, however, that you first master the science of arcanima. The strategic training you receive here will serve you well no matter the path you eventually choose to walk. Return to me when your reason tells you the time is right.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to the Armoury system. Quests to unlock the other classes can be undertaken by speaking to the receptionist in the corresponding guild.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: There exist myriad disciplines in Eorzea that adventurers can take up. For the most rewarding experience, however, it is recommended that you first focus on mastering your current class.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Forename! Now!
Execute Stratagem Focus Fire!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Strike now with all your might!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Do not forget the precondition!
Adjust your tactics accordingly!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Forename!
Switch to Combat Pattern 2538: “Evasive Maneuvers”!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Avoiding bomb blasts is your top priority!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Interrupt casting if you must!
Focus on mobility!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: An excellent decision!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Your combat style gives me an idea...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
I must formulate a new tactic.
The battlefield is yours!
